title: I Just Got a 2 Hour Queue Dodge Penalty for Nemesis Draft?

replies.body: Looking into this, it looks like you had dodged a blind pick earlier.  To prevent abuse, queue dodging a second time while in Nemesis Draft can result in a 2-hour lower priority queue per our [Nemesis Draft](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204191960-Nemesis-Draft-Mode-FAQ#h2q2) guide.  [Queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) escalations can stack regardless of what game mode that dodge occurred.  I know that sucks to hear, but hopefully it helps clear things up!
I strictly remember this being my first dodge in a while, but If you say so guess I'll just wait it out. Oh well.
Pro tip: Don't dodge. A little maturity will go a long way. Yeah okay, it might be a match up you dont want to play... but just do it anyway. Its not like you are locked into playing it for life.

No dodging is essential. If I'm playing ranked and some guys are being toxic before the match starts I will not hesitate to dodge. -3 LP is better then -20 LP and getting tilted because allies were toxic ( and then losing further games). I could tell these guys were going to be toxic because I asked "Is there a reason you guys chose Noc and Singed because those are good champs in any comp" and they responded with "go play ranked and bitch about it crybaby"

Well there is a huge difference between ranked and nemesis draft... I completely understand if players dodge a ranked, but it's just extremely annoying in a fun mode where it's clear from the beginning that your champion will probably be crap.
I tried to play nemesis draft four times yesterday and 3 of those games were dodged in the last seconds of champ select. It's just a huge waste of time... In my opinion fun modes like ARAM and nemesis draft should have a seperate dodge escalation from ranked, but should be punished harder.

Dodging is always unacceptable. You get some shit games, deal with it. Or dont queue up. If you're so worried about not getting the perfect game, play a custom game with some buddies and quit wasting everyones time.
Hey, I am unable to access the Nemesis Draft guide. I would love to see the escalation stack.
